title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu does not always close all the editors.
EB: It should close the file without prompt as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt)
2. Open multiple files in the editor
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
